Title: Severe Thunderstorm Warning
Body: A severe weather risk will exist across the Indiana and Northwest Ohio mainly late this afternoon and tonight. Storm is capable of producing heavy rains, strong winds, large hail and tornados. The likelihood of tornado activity is high. For additional information and the latest updates, please visit http://www.spc.noaa.gov/.
